long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access your Gale content directly from Google!  Now you can view your library’s Gale contents from a Google search.
 
Gale’s Opposing Viewpoints extension provides learners with a path from Google to authoritative content within their library’s Gale database.  Retrieve results covering today’s prominent social issues from this cross-curricular research tool.
 
Note: Access to this resource is provided through your school or local library. You may be prompted to login using your library credentials.
